definition: to scratch/old variant of 騷|骚[sao1]
variant of 癢|痒[yang3]/to itch/to tickle
lit. to scratch the outside of the boot (idiom)/fig. beside the point/ineffectual

sentences.english: Capturing text of interest just scratches the surface.
sentences.chinese: 捕获感兴趣的文本仅仅是隔靴搔痒。

sentences.english: The scrapie agent in sheep may be similar to viroids.
sentences.chinese: 绵羊的搔痒病因子可能也是类病毒。

sentences.english: Tickle Me Elmo is the ENIAC of fractional AI.
sentences.chinese: 搔痒娃娃就是分人工智能界的ENIAC始祖计算机。

sentences.english: This machine-tool is always at fault.
Cancer treatments and strong painkillers like morphine can also cause itchiness .
sentences.chinese: 癌症疗法和止痛片象吗啡也可以引起搔痒。

sentences.english: Before those injections, the mice scratched vigorously.
sentences.chinese: 在注射前，这些白鼠搔痒的非常厉害。

sentences.english: The occupants of the rooms are yawning too, or else scratching themselves.
sentences.chinese: 屋子里注的房客也在打哈欠，或是在替自己搔痒。

sentences.english: Through laboratory and clinic investigation, it was found that antibacterical property of silk dress had a pretty curing effect to skin scratchness.
sentences.chinese: 本文阐述了丝绸服饰对治疗皮肤搔痒症的良好效果。

sentences.english: But this is the rub of course, because conspiracy theories are self-sealing.
sentences.chinese: 但这只是隔靴搔痒而已，因为阴谋论都是自动生成的。

sentences.english: Pruritis, papules, pustules, crusts and scabs.
sentences.chinese: 搔痒，丘疹，脓疱，外皮坚硬并结痂。

sentences.english: Scratch my back and I'll scratch yours.
sentences.chinese: 你给我捶背，我替你搔痒。

sentences.english: But if a pandemic does occur, this would be small comfort indeed.
sentences.chinese: 但是，如果流行病真的发生了，这将只是隔靴搔痒。

definition: variant of 癢|痒[yang3]/to itch/to tickle
to scratch/to mess about with/to quarrel/to scramble to do/sb or sth that one can rely on
